title: Amrita Rawat
text:
Amrita Rawat (born 10 August 1958), also known as Shri Amrita Mata ji (by her followers), is a <a href="Member%20of%20the%20Legislative%20Assembly%20%28India%29">Member of the Legislative Assembly</a> of <a href="Uttarakhand">Uttarakhand</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. Shri Amrita Rawat is married to <a href="Satpal%20Maharaj">Shri Satpal Maharaj</a>.
Role in stabilization of Uttarakhand during hardship.
Shri Amrita Rawat along with <a href="Satpal%20Maharaj">Shri Satpal Maharaj</a> and in-coordination with <a href="Manav%20Utthan%20Sewa%20Samiti">Manav Utthan Sewa Samiti</a> was always available for help of the disaster-stricken people as a representative of the people of
